incidents.title: Connection timeouts to applications and Heroku Postgres

updates.contents:
Due to connection timeouts there is a disruption of multiple services such as releases, scaling dynos, Heroku Dashboard, etc.

Customer applications and add-on services including Heroku Postgres are also being impacted by connection timeouts.
updates.title: Connection timeouts to applications and Heroku Postgres

updates.contents: We are investigating reports of heightened levels of connection timeouts for requests to applications, as well as for Heroku Postgres requests.
updates.title: Connection timeouts to applications and Heroku Postgres
